fields.description:
42nd Street Bagel Café is a family owned restaurant centrally located in the heart of the Claremont Village. Many small groups of people can be found here daily visiting over a cup of coffee and enjoying a freshly made meal and friendly, casual atmosphere.

Our menu includes 27 different bagel varieties baked fresh throughout the day. Nothing is better than a warm bagel right out of the oven with your choice of 11 different whipped cream cheeses. Patrons enjoy our many blends and FREE REFILLS of Gaviña Gourmet Coffee where a new flavor is featured daily at our coffee bar. All flavors can also be purchased in bulk by the pound or 1/2 pound and enjoyed later at home.
fields.discount: 10%: Claremont College Students only with I.D.
fields.name: 42nd Street Bagel Cafe

fields.description: Located in the Village, in Claremont, CA, Aromatique Skin and Body Care is a unique skincare salon, and a bath and body shopping boutique. The licensed staff at Aromatique provides expert skincare treatments such as facials, massage, waxing, make-up artistry, microdermaabrasion, and various other skincare specialties. Our store and product boutique offers a diverse selection of professional skincare, make-up, bath and body products, home fragrance, personal products, home fragrance, personal accessory items, and one-of-a-kind gift items.
fields.discount: 10%: Claremont College students only, 10% discount on products only.
fields.address:
319 W First St Ste A
Claremont, CA 91711-4743
fields.name: Aromatique

fields.description: Bringing Skate and Hip-Hop culture together in a comfortable little spot in The Claremont Village. Come through and visit us to see what’s new, or sign up for our email list so that you can always be up on what’s fresh here at Authentix!
fields.discount: 10%: for all students
fields.name: Authentix Sneaker & Clothing

fields.description: Bikram yoga is a demanding, 26 pose (asana) series. It is done in a heated room to warm up your whole body. This allows you to work deep into your muscles, tendons and ligaments, and to change your body from the inside out. Bikram yoga is a system that can reduce the symptoms of many chronic diseases, and is an excellent preventive activity for parts of the body that are healthy. The class is designed for all levels: first time students and experienced practitioners alike. Bikram yoga increases flexibility, improves circulation and reduces stress, to provide an infinite number of benefits. The more you put into the class, the more you will get out of it. It is a wonderful journey. Be patient with yourself and enjoy!!
fields.discount: 20%: discount for ALL STUDENTS off all regular prices. Please call for Student special low semester rates.
fields.address:
150 W San Jose Ave.
Claremont, CA 91711
fields.name: Bikram's Yoga College of India

fields.description: Ben D. Bollinger's Candlelight Pavilion Dinner Theatre provides patrons with a dinner theatre and musicals for a theatrical experience the caliber of the Broadway shows in downtown LA without the freeway or parking dilemmas. Located in the Inland Empire, California, patrons enjoy corporate events, parties, fundraisers, and banquets. The gourmet food prepared by the executive chef and served by his formal wait staff ranks the Candlelight Pavilion Dinner Theatre as a fine food restaurant that rivals any fine dining establishment in Los Angeles and San Bernardino.
fields.discount: 20%: Up to four students with valid I.D. for regular performances only.
fields.name: Candlelight Pavilion Dinner Theater

fields.description: Carducci’s Tuxedo provides sale and rental services for all your groom and formal wear needs in Claremont.  No matter what, we are not satisfied until you are with all of the details you have been dreaming about.  It is all about your special day, and you should not have to compromise, we will do everything we possibly can to make sure you are fully satisfied and happy.
fields.discount: 20%: All Claremont College and High School students welcome with I.D. Cannot combine this discount with coupons, only one discount applicable at time of purchase.

fields.description: Claremont Print has had a long and successful history in the printing industry, first opening it's doors in 1969. Since then, continuing improvements have been made to our equipment and business processes to enhance our ability to serve our clients and stay current with the latest technologies. We have a dedicated and well trained staff who make quality and customer service their number one priority.

fields.description: Dining halls closed? Hungry after a long evening of studying? Come to the Coop Fountain, your student-managed and student-staffed on-campus restaurant! Try our daily specials, or get one of our classic Coop Meals to refuel. We even have take-out containers, for those times when you need to be somewhere ten minutes ago and don’t have time to eat!
fields.discount:
Pomona Students: Bring your own cup and get it filled with soda or coffee for only 25 cents!

Pomona Faculty and Staff: Show your ID, and get free soda or coffee!
fields.name: Coop Fountain

fields.description:
At Escape Salon we are dedicated to professionalism, through extensive training and continued education. Our goal is to provide you with the best service possible. 

We use only the highest quality professional hair care products available. We are partnered up with the top leading hair care brands in the industry. All of our clients at Escape support us through the purchase of retail products, which in turn, allows Escape to hold education classes to better serve you, our clients. Escape is deeply dedicated to better serving you through the Power of Education.
fields.discount: 15%: All students on presentation of I.D. on products only.
fields.address:
250 W First St Ste 146
Claremont, CA 91711-4745
fields.name: Escape Salon

fields.description:
Located inside the beautiful DoubleTree by Hilton Claremont, Essentials Day Spa offers a variety of services that will transform your mind, body and spirit.

   Step into the tranquil ambiance of our day spa and salon and prepare to be pampered. Treat yourself to a day or just an hour of sheer bliss. Our professional aestheticians, massage therapists and nail technicians will delight and calm your mind, body, and spirit with serene music, gentle touch, and aromatic smells. We invite you to experience the wide range of spa services available.
fields.discount: 15%: College and High school students on presentation of I.D. Only on spa and hair services - minimum $25 purchase. Offer excludes gift certifcates and spa packages.
fields.name: Essentials Day Spa And Salon

fields.description: Located in the Claremont Village, Hendricks Pharmacy is your local independent pharmacy.  We accept most insurance plans and offer FREE delivery.  We also have a solution for you if you need help remembering to order you medication, it's the AUTO-REFILL system.
fields.discount: 10%: for all students on presentation of I.D. on over-the-counter items only.
fields.name: Hendricks Pharmacy

fields.description: The Honnold Café is located near the south entrance to Honnold Mudd Library. The Honnold Café provides the students, faculty and staff of the Claremont Colleges, with a warm relaxing environment in which to enjoy gourmet coffee and espresso based beverages, as well as delicious food and pastries.
fields.address:
Honnold/Mudd Library, 1st floor
800 North Dartmouth Avenue
Claremont, CA 91711
fields.name: Honnold Café

fields.description:
Formerly The Little Pizza Place, Jay's Place was renovated in 2005 in remembrance of Jay Wolkin ’99, who died in an airplane crash shortly before he was to graduate from HMC. Jay, an engineering major and proctor of North Dorm, was a free-spirited person who lived life to the fullest.

The late-night eatery’s makeover—made possible in part by funds from Wolkin’s family—included an updated entrance, renovated pizza kitchen, a sub sandwich service area, pool tables and sunken seating area with wheelchair accessibility.

Jay’s Place serves pizza, sandwiches, soft drinks and snacks, and offers its night-owl patrons music, movies and billiards.
fields.address:
Harvey Mudd College
Platt Campus Center, Lower Level
fields.name: Jay's Place

fields.description:
Nestled in the Claremont Village, La Piccoletta has been a favorite with the locals and a hidden treasure to those who delight in discovering good food.  For over 25 years La Piccoletta has been offering authentic Italian Cuisine in an intimate and  rustic environment.  Anyone could easily find a trattoria like this in any small village in Italy, but it is a rarity to find a jewel like it in the United States.

We serve Lunch Tuesday through Friday 11:30-2:00 and Dinner Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 pm, our menu consists of several pasta dishes as well as other menu choices. All are made made fresh daily.  Chef Roger may even surprise us with one of his speciality items from week to week.
fields.discount: Thursday $10 College Meal Night
fields.address:
114 N Indian Hill Blvd
Claremont, CA 91711
fields.name: La Piccoletta

fields.description:
The Motley’s Mission is: 

* To be a socially responsible business that explores diverse feminist critiques
* To connect the Claremont Colleges with local and global communities by perpetuating sustainable supply chains
* To foster independent thinking and purposeful change

(They also sell coffee and baked goods.)
fields.discount: Bring your own mug or use one of theirs for $1 off "to go" prices on drinks. (Using a Motley mug means you must leave your ID at the counter until you return the mug.)
fields.address:

Seal Court, Scripps College
1030 Columbia Avenue
Claremont, CA 91711

fields.description: Our goal at  the Optometric Vision Center of Claremont , the eyecare office of Dr. Anna M. Torres, is to blend state of the art technology for vision care with quality optical service service and vision products, such as eyeglasses, contact lenses , and other opthalmic products. We serve patients of all ages, including geriatric care to the care of small chidren in the communities surrounding Claremont and Upland. The Optometric Vision Center of Claremont  enjoys helping a wide variety of different patients.  The staff and Dr. Torres strive to make each visit to the Optometric Vision Center of Claremont  an anticipated event for all patients. The " Optometric Vision Center of Claremont Experience",  inspires many of our patients to refer their friends, family and co-workers to us for their next vision exam.
fields.discount: 20%: All students on presentation of I.D.
fields.address:
1420 N Claremont Blvd Ste 209B
Claremont, CA 91711
fields.name: Optometric Vision Center of Claremont

The little sub shop that began over 30 years ago in Denver, CO still has the same bold ideas that we had in the beginning. We boldly believe that your food should taste great and that we should use only the highest quality ingredients to create your perfect lunch.

fields.description: Customize your bath and body products into your very own signature scent. We have over 200 high-quality essential & perfume-grade oils to choose from. Let us blend for you a pink paraben-free Vitamin Lotion scented with Lavender & Vanilla. Or maybe you prefer a yellow Salt Scrub scented with Orange Blossom & Lime. Our Hydrating Botanical Mist is wonderful scented with Sweet Clover & Lilac.
fields.discount: 10%: discount for Claremont College students only.
fields.address:
175 N Indian Hill Blvd Ste 100-A
Claremont, CA 91711
fields.name: The Bath Workshop

fields.description:
At the Body Center Physical Therapy we specialize in the evaluation and treatment of orthopedic injuries, movement dysfunction, cardiac conditions, sports-related injuries, spine conditions, post-surgical care, and auto accident injuries. Your individualized treatment plan is designed to meet your personal goals and is based on effective interventions supported by clinical and scientific evidence. Rapid patient recovery is facilitated by clear clinical reasoning, impairment focused treatment, good communication, patient education and instruction in a progressive home rehabilitation program.

The Body Center’s Pilates Studio is a state of the art Pilates facility complete with multiple Pilates apparatus and Stott Certified instructors. We offer individual instruction in the Pilates method on the mat, reformer, Cadillac and chair utilizing a classic approach to Pilates. Our instructors have diverse training and experience to integrate functional core training exercises using Bosu trainer and stability balls to provide variety to clients who desire complementary activities. We also have group reformer classes at all levels from beginner to advanced.
fields.discount:
Students pay $10 for each appointment if they use insurance cards provided by the Claremont Colleges; to obtain this discount, students must visit their Student Health Center.
Classes that fulfill PE requirements are offered (cost usually around $30.)
fields.address:
224 N Indian Hill Blvd 
Claremont CA 91711
fields.name: The Body Center Physical Therapy

fields.description:
In 1972, Robbin and Debbie Lantz opened a small jewelry store in Claremont, California with the dream of designing and making the highest quality jewelry in the area. Known for expert repairs, brilliant diamonds and unique custom designs; the Lantzes bought La Verne Jewelers in 1979 and continued to grow a great business by focusing on the finest quality diamonds, gemstones, jewelry and customer service available anywhere. 

Since 1996, The Diamond Center in the Claremont Village has continued the Lantzes legacy of creating jewelry to match the dreams of our clients. With Robbin and Debbie's son, Ray Lantz, working in the business, our partnership with Hearts on Fire Diamonds and our continued commitment to exceeding expectations, the future is bright at The Diamond Center.
fields.discount: Free jewelry cleaning
fields.name: The Diamond Center

fields.description: "A perfect gathering place – “it’s all good at The Hub”!  Come by with your friends to relax, enjoy all-natural beef burgers, traditional pub-style favorites and signature made-to-order deli sandwiches and wraps.  Enjoy freshly-prepared grab and go sandwiches and salads, made-from-scratch soups, house made desserts and an array of bottled beverages."
fields.name: The Hub Grill

(MBE), a wholly owned subsidiary of United Parcel Service (“UPS”) of America, Inc., is the world’s largest franchisor of retail shipping, postal, printing and business service centers. The UPS Store® and Mail Boxes Etc.® together comprise nearly 4,700 independently owned locations in the U.S., Puerto Rico and Canada, providing convenient and value-added business services to the small-office/home-office (SOHO) market, corporate "road warriors," and consumers.
